No. II(2)/HWMP/216(d-18)/2020.
The Governor of Tamil Nadu having been satisfied that the lands specified in the Schedule below have to be acquired for the Highways purpose of wit for Strengthening and widening of SH-23 Mayiladuthurai - Thiruvarur Road from km 04/500 to 05/020 km at Agarakeerangudi village, Mayiladuthurai Taluk, Nagapattinam District and it has already been decided that the entire amount of compensation to be awarded for the lands is to be paid out of the funds controlled or managed by the Divisional Engineer(H), Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Kumbakonam after considering the cause shown by the owner (or) other persons having interest on such lands as the case may be do hereby publish the following

NOTICE
Classification
Total Extent in Hec.
Under sub-section (1) of Section 15 of the Tamil Nadu Highways Act, 2001 (Tamil Nadu Act 34 of 2002) the Governor of Tamil Nadu hereby acquires the land specified in the Schedule below measuring to an extent of 579 sq.mts of Wet lands in Agarakeerangudi Village, Mayiladuthurai Taluk, Nagapattinam District for the purpose of width for Strengthening and widening of SH-23 Mayiladuthurai - Thiruvarur Road from km 04/500 to 05/020 km.
The plan of the lands are kept in the Office of the Special District Revenue Officer (Land Acquisition), Kumbakonam and office of the Special Tashildar (Land Acquisition), Chennai Kanyakumari Industrial Corridor Project, Sirkali, may be inspected at any time during office hours.
